channel.title: Notes on T|A
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on T|A

item.title: NOTES: GPU Architecture, TVM, and Triton
item.description: My reading notes on GPU hardware, TVM compilation, and Triton JIT for efficient tensor computation.

item.title: NOTES: VMing the Containers - The Latency-Availability Tradeoff
item.description: Exploring the tradeoffs between containers and virtual machines, from trap-and-emulate to modern orchestration systems. Spoiler: they're both here to stay.

item.title: NOTES: TensorFlow, TorchDynamo, and TorchInductor
item.description: My reading notes on two generations of ML system papers: TensorFlow’s distributed execution model and PyTorch 2.0’s compiler stack (TorchDynamo + TorchInductor).

item.title: NOTES: Searching the unsearchable
item.description: Levenshtein automata, inverted indexes, BM25, segment merges, ANN vectors, CDC pipelines, and why Elasticsearch is basically three PhDs stapled together with JSON.

item.title: NOTES: MMORPGs From BE Eng Perspective
item.description: A technical, continuous train-of-thought on building an MMO backend: edge computing, server topologies and authority, clock sync, spatial partitioning with quadtrees, and a deep dive into cloth sync.

item.title: NOTES: Lgtm Stack or Die
item.description: Alloy, Mimir, Loki, Tempo, Phlare, S3, and a lot of hair-pulling

item.title: NOTES: End to ending Data Warehouses as a concept
item.description: A slightly practical walkthrough of designing a CDC-powered data pipeline: ingestor, bronze lake, silver warehouse, and dbt-powered golden marts with batch DAGs, streaming joins, state management, and chunked reducers.

item.title: NOTES: Tail of Two Regulation and Compliance
item.description: Notes from building fintech features and surviving real audits.
